summary: Belonging to a lower caste, Lakshmi and her deaf-mute husband Kishtayya serve the landlord's son, Surya. When Surya's young wife finds out about his affair with Lakshmi, they all find themselves at crossroads.
cast: Shabana Azmi|Sadhu Meher|Anant Nag|Priya Tendulkar|Aga Mohamed Hussain|Mirza Qadirali Baig|Hemant Jeshwant Rao|Satyanarayan|Sesham Raju|Hameed Rashid|Aslam Akhtar|Syed Yakoob|Jagat Jeevan|Prafullata Natu|Kaleem Siddiqui|Tulsi Bai|Subhash Singh|Ahman Akhtar|Dalip Tahil|John Israel|Swadesh Pal|Vijaylakshmi|Sultana Bano|Khalil|Mahendra Dutt|Suguna Reddy|Ram Allam
title: Ankur
